title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Weather              Weather       The climate can be quite different depending on the time of year and what side of the mountain range you decide to visit.  Coastal (Malibu Side) Western (Thousand Oaks/Newbury Park/Westlake Area) Inland West (Sandstone Peak/Boney Mountain Area) Inland Central South (Solstice/Zuma Area)  Inland Central North (Agoura Hills/Paramount Ranch Area) Inland Eastern (Calabasas Peak/Saddle Peak Area) Simi Hills (Cheeseboro/Palo Comado/Upper Las Virgenes Areas-North of 101)   Always be prepared by dressing appropriately for the weather.
